description: This file contains Python code that generates C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC APIs based on a provided schema. It includes functions for creating API headers, generating classes and enums, and emitting version and stub code.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file declaring JSON-RPC API functions based on provided headers list.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate JSON-RPC related code (classes, enums, version info, stubs, RPC implementations) from a schema, managing file generation based on timestamps and configuration.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
